mapper.select: SELECT post._post_num, post._post_title, post._post_content, post._post_usr, post._post_datetime, img._img_num, img._img_name, img._img_location FROM post post FULL OUTER JOIN img img ON post._post_num = img._img_num WHERE post._post_num = #{_post_num}

SELECT post._post_num, post._post_title, post._post_content, post._post_usr, post._post_datetime, img._img_num, img._img_name, img._img_location FROM post post FULL OUTER JOIN img img ON post._post_num = img._img_source ORDER BY post._post_num DESC;

SELECT comments.comments_id, comments.comments_content, comments._usr_email, comments._post_num, comments.reg_date, reply._reply_num, reply._usr_email AS reply_usr_email, reply.comments_id AS reply_comments_id, reply._post_num AS reply_post_num, reply.reply_content, reply.reply_date FROM comments comments LEFT JOIN reply reply ON comments.comments_id = reply.comments_id WHERE comments._post_num = #{_post_num} ORDER BY comments.comments_id DESC;
mapper.insert: DECLARE @_post_datetime DATETIME SELECT @_post_datetime = getdate() INSERT INTO post VALUES(NEXT VALUE FOR post_seq, #{_post_title}, #{_post_content},'admin', @_post_datetime)
INSERT INTO img VALUES(NEXT VALUE FOR img_seq, #{_img_name}, #{_img_location}, #{_img_source})
INSERT INTO comments VALUES(NEXT VALUE FOR comments_seq, #{comments_content}, #{_usr_email}, #{_post_num}, #{reg_date})
